answers.answer: Very well could be neurothapy. Only testing by a doctor will confirm your condition.

question: Hello , my mother has diabetes for like 20 yrs now. She has neuropathy(cant spell). I had gestational diabetes when i was pregnant. Lately I have been getting this pins and needles feeling in both of my bigs toes. I have also been getting these heat sensations like im sitting next to a heater in different parts of my body. YES im over weight  and YES I eat junk food. I have been trying to eat healthier and im going to start excersizing. Anyone I wanted to know if anyone knew of these symptoms and what it might be??? Thanks
title: PINS AND NEEDLE FEELING IN TOES
